summary: The team reviewed the progress of Q4 initiatives, discussed the impact of API delays, and planned for upcoming deployments and testing. The user testing on wireframes was completed successfully, and the team is preparing for the deployment of the enterprise rate limiting solution.
key_decisions: Deploy the enterprise rate limiting solution next week.
Postpone the full beta test to early September due to API delays.
Prioritize budget approval for mobile device testing.

tasks.task: Finalize and deploy the enterprise rate limiting solution.
Complete the dark mode testing framework.
Prepare budget approval for mobile device testing.
Start load testing preparations for holiday season.

action_items: Mike Rodriguez to follow up with the third-party provider for updated API specifications by Thursday.
David Park to expedite budget approval for mobile device testing.
Lisa Wang to finalize the mobile optimization proposal by August 27th.
Jennifer Adams to prioritize completing the dark mode testing framework.
